Package io.jans.service

Class JsonService

java.lang.Object
io.jans.service.JsonService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@ApplicationScoped @Named public class JsonService extends Object implements Serializable
Service class to work with JSON strings
Author:
Yuriy Movchan Date: 05/14/2013

  • Method Details

    • init

      @PostConstruct public void init()

    • jsonToObject

      public <T> T jsonToObject(String json, Class<T> clazz) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException, IOException
      Deserialize the given JSON string into an instance of the specified class.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the target type
      Parameters:
      json - the JSON content to deserialize
      clazz - the target class to deserialize into
      Returns:
      an instance of clazz populated from the JSON
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException - if the input is not valid JSON
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException - if the JSON cannot be mapped to the target type
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during deserialization

    • jsonToObject

      public <T> T jsonToObject(String json, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JavaType valueType) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException, IOException
      Deserialize a JSON string into an instance described by a Jackson JavaType.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the target type
      Parameters:
      json - the JSON string to deserialize
      valueType - the Jackson JavaType that describes the target type
      Returns:
      the deserialized object matching the specified valueType
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException - if the input is not valid JSON
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException - if the JSON cannot be mapped to the specified type
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during reading

    • objectToJson

      public <T> String objectToJson(T obj) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerationException, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException, IOException
      Serialize the given object to a compact JSON string.
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to serialize to JSON
      Returns:
      the JSON string representation of the object
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerationException - if there is a problem writing JSON content
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException - if there is a problem mapping the object to JSON
      IOException - for other I/O-related errors during serialization

    • objectToPrettyJson

      public <T> String objectToPrettyJson(T obj) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerationException, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException, IOException
      Serialize an object to a pretty-printed JSON string.
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to serialize
      Returns:
      the pretty-printed JSON representation of obj
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerationException - if there is a problem generating JSON content
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException - if mapping between the Java object and JSON fails
      IOException - if an I/O problem occurs during writing

    • getTypeFactory

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.type.TypeFactory getTypeFactory()
      Provide access to the Jackson TypeFactory used by this service.
      Returns:
      the TypeFactory instance from the internal ObjectMapper
